banner.name: Hoang Le
banner.description: Front-end Development with Angular 5 & React.js. Back-end Development with Node.js Express, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

intro.title: Hi, I am Hoang
intro.description: Was born in Viet Nam in 1997, I am currently stuyding final year in VAMK, Vaasa University of Applied Sciences, in Finland. I am trying hard to get a work place with my JavaScript skills. My dream is to become a great Software Engineer and publish the greatest app ever!

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: It can be easily seen as this website, but I had learnt about VPS, Nginx configurations to serve to React application into public.

projects.name: 3D Printing Quotation
projects.description: React application for user who wants to print their 3D files can see it on website, choose material settings and send it to our customer- an engineering company.

exp.description: We are working on a new project Plannr.eu, where people from over the world can get information, contact directly to the service providers, to help them moving to anouther country. I have been fun building new features, making things look good and testing whole application.
